text: "We Be Clubbin'" is the first single from Ice Cube's soundtrack, The Player's Club. It was released in 1998. It reached number 32 in the Rhythmic Top 40. =="We Be Ballin'"== A remix of the song called "We Be Ballin'" was made. Michael Jackson sang in it. Unlike "We Be Clubbin'", there is no swearing. ==References== Category:1998 songs
title: We Be Clubbin'
